description: Manchester United's Paul Pogba celebrates his team's 2-0 win Europa League win, saying they played not only for their country but for the victims of Monday's deadly bombing.

author: BBC Sport
description: Manchester United players including Juan Mata, Ander Herrera, Chris Smalling and Paul Pogba dedicate their Europa League win to the victims and people affected by Monday's attack on Manchester Arena.
title: Manchester United win Europa League: 'We tried to lift the spirits of Manchester'
